title: rustc: "error: internal compiler error: calling transform_self_type_for_method on static method"
body:
Rust version:

```
$ /opt/rust-0.6/bin/rustc -v
/opt/rust-0.6/bin/rustc 0.6
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
$
```

Code to reproduce:

```
struct Test;

pub impl Test {
  pub fn new() -> Test {
    return Test;
  }
}

fn main() {
  let test = Test.new();
}
```

Stack trace:

```
$ RUST_LOG=rustc=1,::rt::backtrace /opt/rust-0.6/bin/rustc reproduce.ts
```
